text: In bed 4, it's Robert Lewis, who wants to be called Bob. He's 62 under Dr. Johnson and he came in with heart attack and had a cabbage. He's got a history of high HD and he's for MRSA and VRE surveillance swab. He is with ongoing surgical wound care which looks nice and clean and healing well. He is complaining of constipation and hasn't opened his bowels for the last 3 days now. Regular appearance, given with good effect and all his obes are all stable. And that's all for me.
